description: Lists information about your connector. You specify the connector on input by its ARN (Amazon Resource Name).

parameters.name: ConnectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateConnector.

nested_items.name: Connector
nested_items.description: A structure that contains information about your connector.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateConnector.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate authority being used.

nested_items.name: CertificateEnrollmentPolicyServerEndpoint
nested_items.description: Certificate enrollment endpoint for Active Directory domain-joined objects reach out to when requesting certificates.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was created.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Active Directory.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the connector. Status can be creating, active, deleting, or failed.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Additional information about the connector status if the status is failed.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was updated.

nested_items.name: VpcInformation
nested_items.description: Information of the VPC and security group(s) used with the connector.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The security groups used with the connector. You can use a maximum of 4 security groups with a connector.
